VBA toolbox
Install Wiki About

Get the toolbox

Download

Archive

Downlad the last stable release as a .zip file

Github

Clone the repo and stay on the edge

Install

Add the VBA-toolbox directory to your Matlab path and save it for automatic loading: 

addpath(genpath('path_to_the/VBA-toolbox'));
 savepath();

Try it!

You re ready to go! Launch the demo_Qlearning for a test, and visit the wiki for more informations.

Participate to the VBA-toolbox!

  • fork on Github
  • post a request
